name: MUD in Golang
description:
This is a very basic MUD server for the Enter the Mud code jam in May 2018. I didn't discover it until about a week and a half before the due date or I'dve probably done a better job. Basic combat/levelling works but there are no drops or trades or anything yet, and the map itself it pretty boring.

Please read the Readme on the project Github page for information on running/connecting to this game.

That said, place names are procedurally generated as is the terrain. The road unfolds ahead of you as you explore.

I'll keep working on this after the jam.
